prompts: Create a small, purple rodent Pokemon that thrives in urban areas and has a mischievous personality.
I want a Normal-type Pokemon with a round body shape and a long, curling tail, perfect for sneaky escapes.
Generate a cute Pokemon that has bright red eyes and a soft, cream-colored belly, ideal for beginner trainers.
Make a tiny, agile creature that can navigate through grasslands and caves with ease, showcasing its vibrant colors.
Imagine a Pokemon resembling a mouse that has a playful demeanor and can be found in forests and urban settings.
Design a Pokemon with a unique purple hue and sharp whiskers, making it stand out in any battle.
Show me a small, elusive Pokemon that is known for its speed and clever tactics during combat.
